snippet: The nation’s president is “pro-Western,” with ample supplies of oil and gas. He is also hugely corrupt and authoritarian.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Azerbaijani Pres Ilham Aliyev as a two-faced leader whose pro-Western exterior belies a hugely corrupt regime with one of the world's worst human rights records; cites government's latest crackdown on freedom of expression and press; calls for United States and Europe to be forthright in their view of Aliyev's dictatorship, even if they are forced to continue doing business with him.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s president is “pro-Western,” with ample supplies of oil and gas. He is also hugely corrupt and authoritarian.

headline.print_headline: The Two Faces of Azerbaijan’s Mr. Aliyev
headline.main: The Two Faces of Azerbaijan’s Mr. Aliyev

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
